00042 class EOS_Tools_VDF: public EOS_Tools_base
00043 {
00044   Declare_instanciable(EOS_Tools_VDF);
00045 public :
00046   const DoubleTab& rho_discvit() const;
00047   void associer_zones(const Zone_dis&,const Zone_Cl_dis&);

00053   inline const DoubleTab& rho_face_n() const { return tab_rho_face; }
00054   inline const DoubleTab& rho_face_np1() const { return tab_rho_face_np1; }

00056
